|brand = ASRock |model = G10 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = June 24, 2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASRock_G10 |wlclass = AC2600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFEB-G10,2AFEB-H2R |icid = 20403-G10,20403-H2R |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 1246-01000152-50Z
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8064; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A15 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz <!-- doc? --> |cpu2chip1 = Actions Microelectronics;AM8251; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU2 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = 600 MHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F1G08ABBEAH4; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;; |flash2size = 128
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = 2 |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram2size = 128 |ram2chip = Nanya;; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Micrel;KSZ8081MNX; |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pad header,, |jtag = yes,, 20-pad header,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MU-MIMO, HDMI, Miracast, IR remote |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASRock,ASRock_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2020 |fccapprovdate = 10/15/2015 |estreldate = 06/04/2015 |estprice = 200 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833967011 |asin = B01717UTXC |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B01DUVQ6TY |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9980; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9980; |rad2chip2 = Realtek;RTL8192EU; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1246-01000152-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2782095 FCC photos]. {{see also|ASRock H2R HDMI Dongle|ASRock X10R|Edimax}}
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://www.asrock.com/news/index.asp?id=2801 Press release] *[http://www.tomshardware.com/news/asrock-router-mu-mimo-g10-networking,29287.html ''ASRock G10'' on '''TomsHardware'''] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/asrock-g10-router.27478/ ''ASRock G10'' on '''SNB''' forums]
===Reviews=== *[http://article.techlabs.by/51_35719.html ''ASRock G10 Router'' on '''TechLabs'''] :'''[[ASRock H2R HDMI Dongle]]''' (MFG OEM: [[Edimax]]) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AFEB-H2R 2AFEB-H2R] (2015-10-13) ''HDMI 2-in-1 Router'' :*SoC: ''Actions Microelectronics'' AM8251 @600MHz MIPS :*Flash: 128MB ''Winbond'', RAM: 128MB ''Nanya'' :*WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8192EU (2T2R 802.11bgn USB 2.0) :*LAN: [[Micrel]] ''(Mindray)'' KSZ8081MNX FE (10/100 PHY)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asrock/asrock_g10 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq806x |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a15_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Notes== ===Features=== *4T4R 802.11ac (1733Mbps) + 4T4R 802.11n (800Mbps) :Beamforming, Multi-User MIMO, [[IoT]] ([[Internet of Things]]) *Detachable 2-in-1 dongle - travel access point (AP) :or an HDMI dongle with 2T2R 802.11n Wi-Fi (Miracast) * HDMI Miracast / EZplay & DLNA (1920x1080 output resolution) :Works with devices: Android / iOS smartphones and tablets
===Specifications=== *WiFi Technology: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac *Antennas: 8x high performance internal dipole antennas :8x high power antennas that deliver wireless signals 360 degrees *Data Rate: 802.11ac up to 1733Mbps, 802.11n up to 800Mbps *Interface: 1WAN + 4LAN Giga Ethernet, Dual USB 3.0 Ports, IR TX+RX *Key Features: Easy Setup, Adjustable Output Power, Parental Control, :Guest Wireless Network, Self-healing, Gaming Boost, Beamforming, :ASRock App, IR Learning Technology, Easy NAS, MU-MIMO, IPv6 *LAN: DHCP, PPPoE, Static IP, PPTP, L2TP *Power Adapter: DC12V Power Input
[[Category:English Documentation]]
